footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kujou Sara | Update Date: 08/08/2022 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Elegy for the End__ The Energy Recharge substat helps with building Sara and the buff from compliments her own personal buff.

__Skyward Harp__ The CRIT from the substat and passive increases Sara's own damage while the high Base ATK increases her own personal buff.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Polar Star, Fading Twilight, Mouun's Moon

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge |CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG|ATK%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Tengu Stormcall
**2)** Elemental Burst: Subjugation - Koukou Sendou
**3)** Normal Attack: Tengu Bowmanship
